title: Embroidery Sample, ca. 1775–1805
medium:
Medium: silk, glass, paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a compound foundation (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Floral pattern embroidered with white silk and clear glass on ground of purple velvet with wavy purple and yellow lines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Sample, ca. 1775–1805.
ca. 1775–1805. Medium: silk, glass, paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a compound foundation (velvet). Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1932-1-56.
